snippet: A Japanese safety board said All Nippon Airways’ damaged Boeing 787 battery had the same type of “thermal runaway” seen on a Japan Airlines 787 battery in Boston.
abstract: Japan Transportation Safety Board says that an investigation into a lithium-ion battery that overheated on a Boeing 787 flight in Japan finds evidence of the same type of 'thermal runaway' issue seen in a similar earlier incident in Boston.
lead_paragraph: A Japanese safety board said All Nippon Airways’ damaged Boeing 787 battery had the same type of “thermal runaway” seen on a Japan Airlines 787 battery in Boston.

headline.seo: Similar Overheating Seen on Two Damaged 787 Batteries
headline.main: Similar Overheating Is Seen on 2 Damaged 787 Batteries
headline.print_headline: Similar Overheating Is Seen On 2 Damaged 787 Batteries
